Product Overview

Once you download the zip file from your themeforest account and extract that. You will get the folder like below:

wieldy-v-0.x

Here any number following v- shows the version of the Wieldy .

Now, inside this folder, you will receive following subfolders and files:

  • wieldy/

    A Ant Design, Ant and React based version powered by ant ui library. To access its documentation, click here

  • build/

    Build folder contains the built distribution (production) version, which is for demo purpose only

  • starter-template/. You can use this folder to kickstart your project with the starter template with auth (Firebase). This way you can start building your project from ground-up.

  • starter-template-without-auth/. If you are looking to use a different authentication system, this is the right folder for you to start with.
